column4: if i just do a mount -o loop to "any" bootable iso to some directory and then i copy the contents from that directory to a pen drive will that pendrive be bootable too??
you're trying to boot non-Ubuntu ISOs from USB?
haha, I didn't mean it that way. I was just going to say that you might find some tutorials for non-Linux ISOs at the pendrivelinux website.
I don't really know. But like I say, pendrivelinux might be helpful.
